details.investmentHighlights:
Prime Highway Commercial Opportunity – 3203 Fayetteville Rd, Hoke County

Positioned along Highway 401, the rapidly growing Fayetteville Road corridor, this 3-acre commercial tract offers exceptional visibility and accessibility with 17,500 vehicles per day passing directly in front of the site. The property features a flat topography, making it highly development-friendly, and is already equipped with water on site and septic in place.

The parcel is zoned Highway Commercial (HC), providing versatile potential for a wide range of retail, service, and commercial uses. Adding further value, a double-wide trailer will convey with the sale, offering immediate use potential or transitional space while planning for future development.

Located in the heart of Hoke County’s expanding commercial district, this site presents a rare chance to secure a prime piece of property in a corridor experiencing rapid growth and strong demand.

name: Bank on Bank Street Absolute NNN

details.investmentHighlights: The Investor should note that the unfinished apartment can either be updated and cleared for occupancy of at least $1200.00 a month. As a new owner you could turn the apartment into an additional office space. The current Tenant is a Bank with its loan department established here with a long term lease and its headquarters are in Guntersville, Alabama.
details.marketingDescription:
The Building has been renovated on the 1st floor to meet the historic atmoshphere and the Bank Street Enviroment.​ It is an Absolute NNN.​

The rich history of the building shows that it was a bank with an old bank vault still in tact but not functional still in the building.​ Another additional part of the building is an unfinished 850 sf single apartment with antique wood paneling and tounge and groove wood floors from the original construction.​ The original design in all downtowns was for the building owner to live in the upstairs apartment.​

Today Downtown Decatur is in the process of over 300 million in various projects.​ These projects include an 80 room  Calhoun College Dorm, 80 room Hotel, and a parking garage on the block between 1st Avenue and 2nd Avenue.​ Calhoun and Athens State University has a brand new Fine Arts division building on 2ndAvenue Downtown that is connected to the new dorms and new dance studio.​

The Cooks Natural History Museum has been in operation downtown withing the last 5 years plus they have just been approved to build a 120 room hotel and a 4 level parking garage.​ 

Also 205 Class A Apartments on Bank Street called Bank Street Station has been approved.​ Green Point Ag is building their headquarters downtown too with over 200 employees.​ 

CSX has promised to build a cargo port from its trains to truck and barge loading terminal.​

There is a new commercial zone setting up on the river for new restaurants and retail within walking distance.​

The city has also been rebuilding the entrance from Hwy 31/6th Ave with its beautification project and is currently underway.​

The City of Decatur has over $300 million in current and resently approved projects for the downtown area.​

Strategically located just off Interstate 30, the property is situated in a densely residential area near Baylor Scott & White Hospital and various retail establishments.​ The landlord conducts monthly inspections to ensure proper maintenance of each unit.​ For more information, please contact Ross Miller.​

description: STRATEGICALLY LOCATED EXTENDED-STAY HOTEL DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY
name: Candlewood Suites San Antonio Med Ctr Development Project

details.investmentHighlights:
Highly Desirable Candlewood Suites Extended-Stay Hotel Development Opportunity

  • ​

    Upon approval and development of the Candlewood Suites, an investor can expect a new, 20-year license agreement with InterContinental Hotels Group (IHG).

  • ​

    The all-suite design promotes guest independence, which yields to lower housekeeping costs and higher profits. This business model benefits an investor to operate an asset that yields high gross-operating-profit (GOP) margins and net operating income (NOI) flow-through.

  • ​

    The brand’s extended-stay orientation helps to drive occupancy levels and reduce the team member-to-guest ratio, resulting in lower operating costs and some of the highest profit margins in the industry.

  • ​

    With more than 100 million members, IHG gives members access to more than 6,600 hotels across 19 brands. The IHG One Rewards is an effective tool for driving customers to IHG hotels and creating brand loyalty.

Strong Market Fundamentals, Absence of Midscale Extended-Stay Supply

  • ​

    There is a shortage of newer vintage, premium-branded, extended-stay hotels in the local submarket, which also lacks a midscale extended-stay hotel product, such as a Candlewood Suites hotel.

  • ​

    Per the STR trend report, the competitive submarket—comprising four midscale to upper-midscale extended-stay and limited-service hotels—achieved an average occupancy level of 62.6%, average daily rate (ADR) of $101, and RevPAR of $63 for the trailing-twelve-month (TTM) period ending February 2025.

  • ​

    According to the occupancy tax receipts for year-end 2024, the 2007-built TownePlace Suites by Marriott San Antonio Northwest, located adjacent to the property, achieved a RevPAR of $47, amounting to $2.1 million (rounded) in rooms revenue.

  • ​

    Once developed, the proposed hotel will be the newest hotel in the competitive set, superior to its competitors in terms of quality and product offering, inclusive of the in-room kitchens.

  • ​

    Based on HVS pro-forma projections, stabilized rooms revenue is anticipated to exceed $2.4 million, with an NOI flow-through of over $1,100,000 (rounded), resulting in a RevPAR of over $78.

Excellent I-10 Location Among Strong Corporate & Leisure Demand Generators

  • ​

    The property is strategically located near the intersection of Fredericksburg and Prue Roads, just west of the Huebner Road Exit along Interstate 10 (I-10), approximately three miles from the South Texas Medical Center (STMC) and five miles from Six Flags Fiesta Texas.

  • ​

    Other corporate demand generators nearby include USAA’s corporate headquarters’ campus, LabCorp, Frost Bank, Whataburger, HEB, Valero, Tesoro, and Rackspace.

  • ​

    Available dining options near the property include Cracker Barrel Old Country Store; Bill Miller BBQ; Magnolia Pancake Haus; Snooze, an A.M. Eatery; and Alamo Biscuit Company & Panadería.

Significant Upside for Developer to Exit

  • ​

    The offering presents a developer with an opportunity to construct a Candlewood Suites hotel in a major metropolitan area, with a potentially attractive exit capitalization rate.

  • ​

    Following construction and stabilization of operations, the hotel asset would be a desired investment for the comprehensive pool of regional and national investors interested in premium-branded hotel investments.

  • ​

    The offering also includes an option to develop the adjoining pad site for retail use or quick-service restaurant (QSR) construction, which would provide natural synergy for an extended-stay hotel to further increase guest retention; alternatively, an investor would have the ability to subdivide and sell off the pad site.
details.marketingDescription:
For more information, please visit the HVS marketing website to electronically execute the confidentiality agreement and get access to the Virtual Deal Room (VDR): LINK HERE

HVS Brokerage & Advisory, as the exclusive representative of ownership, is pleased to present the opportunity to acquire a strategically located 2.36-acre parcel totaling 102,845 square feet, fully entitled for the development of an 86-key Candlewood Suites hotel and an adjacent pad site in San Antonio, Texas.​ The property is located approximately three miles northwest of the South Texas Medical Center (STMC), a major hub for medical research and healthcare in the region.​

PRICE REDUCTION: $1,375,000

Ownership is motivated to sell the property and has agreed to reduce the price to $1,375,000.​ Please contact Matthew Omansky for more details.​

details.marketingDescription:
Register to Bid and Access Due Diligence Documents on RealINSIGHT Marketplace

Marcus & Millichap and RI Marketplace are pleased to present a vacant, free-standing retail building located at 2329 W North Avenue in Milwaukee, Wisconsin (the “Property”).​ Formerly occupied by Advance Auto Parts, the Property is being offered significantly below replacement cost, providing an excellent opportunity for owner/users or investors to acquire a highly visible and strategically positioned asset at a significant discount.​ FIRST BID MEETS RESERVE!

Built in 2021, the Property consists of a one-story, free-standing retail building containing ±7,054 square feet, with 27 total surface parking spaces on a ±0.833-acre parcel.​ The site is positioned on a hard corner and is easily accessible via two (2) ingress/egress curb cuts and 145’ frontage along West North Avenue and 249’ frontage along North 23rd Street.​ Zoned CS, Commercial Service District, this zoning offers favorable flexible zoning allowing for a variety of uses.​

The Property is located in Milwaukee, approximately 2-miles north of downtown.​ Once known primarily for its breweries and as the home of Harley-Davidson, the metro is diversifying from its manufacturing roots as the health care, business services and technology sectors expand.​ The transformation is especially evident in downtown Milwaukee, where major projects — including high-rise apartments, Northwestern Mutual’s headquarters and the BMO Tower — have changed the skyline.​ The Property benefits from being located on a hard-corner with frontage along both W North Avenue (±16,492 VPD) and North 23rd Street within a dense and established commercial area.​ North Avenue serves as a major east-west arterial roadway with nearby access to I-43 (±165K VPD) providing excellent regional connectivity throughout Milwaukee and its suburbs.​ The Property is situated approximately ±2.5-miles from Downtown Milwaukee, home to major corporate campuses such as Northwestern Mutual’s headquarters and the BMO Tower.​ Retail activity is further supported by strong nearby national and local retailers including Popeyes, Save a Lot, Checkers, Auto Zone, Walgreens, Family Dollar, and more.​ Additional educational demand generators include the Marquette University (±1.9-mi) with over 11,000 enrolled students and University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee (±4-mi) serving approximately 22,937 (2023) students.​ The Property is positioned within an extremely dense trade area, serving ±239,604 residents within a 3-mi radius and 484,853 residents with an average household income exceeding $71k within a 5-mile radius.​

details.marketingDescription:
Welcome to the newly transformed Indigo Hotel, an oceanfront sanctuary located at 2209 S.​ Ocean Blvd, Myrtle Beach, SC.​
Completely redesigned in 2025, our hotel seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with luxurious elegance to offer guests an
unparalleled coastal experience.​ Our 54 oceanfront rooms are thoughtfully designed to cater to diverse preferences: One-Bedroom
Suites: Ideal for guests seeking additional space and privacy, these suites feature separate living areas and fully equipped
kitchens.​ Large Efficiency Units: Combining comfort and convenience, these units come with kitchen facilities, perfect for extended
stays or family vacations.​ Amenities: Direct Beach Access: Step directly from the hotel onto the pristine sands of Myrtle Beach,
perfect for sunbathing, swimming, or leisurely strolls along the shore.​ Outdoor Pool and Hot Tub: Relax in our heated outdoor pool
or unwind in the hot tub, both offering serene ocean vistas.​ Complimentary Wi-Fi: Stay connected with high-speed internet access
available throughout the property.​ Nearby Attractions: Indigo Hotel's prime location offers easy access to a variety of attractions,
shopping, and dining options: Myrtle Beach Boardwalk & Promenade: A lively 1.2-mile stretch featuring shops, restaurants, and
entertainment venues, just a short drive away.​ SkyWheel Myrtle Beach: Experience panoramic coastal views from this nearly 200
-foot-tall observation wheel, located at the promenade.​ The Market Common: An upscale district offering a blend of shopping,
dining, and entertainment options.​ Myrtle Beach State Park: Explore maritime forests, walking trails, and unspoiled beaches in this
natural haven.​ Brookgreen Gardens: Located in nearby Murrells Inlet, this expansive garden boasts impressive sculptures and
diverse flora.​ The 2nd Ave Pier : A classic fishing pier offering live entertainment, restaurants, a café, and stunning ocean views.​
Ripley’s Believe It or Not!: Explore oddities and curiosities at this popular museum, situated within the primary tourist hub 2 miles
from the hotel.​ Indigo Hotel's prime location offers proximity to a variety of attractions, shopping, and dining options.​ The Grand
Strand Experience Myrtle Beach, part of South Carolina's famed Grand Strand, offers over 60 miles of sandy shores and a
plethora of activities: Golf: With numerous world-class golf courses, the area is a golfer's paradise.​ Water Sports: Engage in jet
skiing, parasailing, and paddle boarding along the coast.​ Shopping: From outlet malls to boutique shops, there's something for
every shopper.​ Dining: Savor fresh seafood and regional specialties at a variety of local restaurants.​ Myrtle Beach continues to
thrive as a top tourist destination: Visitor Statistics: In 2023, the area welcomed 17.6 million visitors, who contributed over twelve
billion in spending, marking a 4.7% increase from the previous year.​ Festivals and Events: The region hosts multiple festivals and
shows annually, attracting diverse audiences and enhancing the cultural landscape.​ Population Growth: Horry County has been
among the fastest-growing counties in the nation in recent years, reflecting the area's appeal to both tourists and new residents.​

details.marketingDescription:
CBRE is pleased to offer for sale 7723-7741 Wild Plum Avenue (Wild Boar Apartments), a 24-unit apartment community located in University City, a suburb of St.​ Louis,

Missouri.​ This property benefits from its proximity to Washington University (16,552 students), a major educational institution, as well as the vibrant Delmar Loop, a renowned entertainment and retail district in University City.​ The area’s unique blend of suburban charm and urban convenience makes it an attractive option for students, faculty, and professionals alike.​ With its strategic location just nine miles from Lambert-St.​ Louis International Airport and six miles from downtown St.​ Louis, this property offers easy access to the city’s cultural and recreational attractions, making it an ideal investment opportunity in the St.​ Louis MSA.​

Built in 1957 and renovated in 2008, the Property offers an investor the rare opportunity to acquire a stabilized asset with proven operating performance and tremendous upside potential.​ 100% of the units are in classic or near classic condition, allowing new ownership the opportunity to push rents through further continued unit upgrades or increasing in-place rents to market rate.​ The Property features a mix of 2 and 3 bedroom apartment homes with 1.5 baths.​ Unit amenities include air conditioning, hardwood floors, ceiling fans, washer/dryer hookups, kitchen appliances, and reserved parking.​

With a convenient centralized location, Wild Boar Apartments is situated in University City which borders Ladue and Clayton, which are some of the wealthiest municipalities in the St.​ Louis MSA (St.​ Louis Business Journal) and fall within the top 100 wealthiest suburbs in the United States (Bloomberg-2019).​

While the property is operational and stabilized, select interior and exterior upgrades would further enhance rent potential and market competitiveness.

Investment Highlights

Strong Market Fundamentals:
Limited new supply, steady population growth, and sustained demand for affordable and workforce housing continue to drive occupancy and rent stability.

Immediate Income & Value-Add Upside:
The asset offers solid in-place income with additional upside through targeted renovations, rent optimization, and operational efficiencies.

Strategic Location:
Situated in a high-growth corridor benefiting from major public and private redevelopment projects, improved infrastructure, and neighborhood reinvestment.

Proven Demand Drivers:
Nearby communities are fully occupied, with market rents near $1,600 and subsidized units around $1,500, confirming strong rental demand and limited supply.

Recession-Resilient Asset Class:
Workforce housing assets historically outperform across economic cycles, offering stable cash flow and downside protection for investors.
details.marketingDescription:
True Value-Add Opportunity in Atlanta’s West End Area

Exceptional investment potential in the Dixie Hills neighborhood, offering convenient access to nearby parks, I-20, and Downtown Atlanta.​ The current owner has made no efforts to increase rents or lease remaining vacancies in anticipation of a sale, leaving substantial upside on the table.​

Average in-place rents are only $800 per unit, well below market.​ This is not a cap-rate sale — the property is approximately 90% occupied and being sold strictly as-is, representing a true value-add opportunity based on future performance rather than current income.​

20 units feature 2-bed/1-bath floor plans in classic condition.​ An existing studio room with a full bathroom (currently used by maintenance) brings the total to 21 units.​ Each unit includes central HVAC, in-unit laundry connections, and separately metered electric and gas; water is master-metered.​

The property enjoys easy access to I-20, Downtown Atlanta, and the West End.​ Notably, a $75.5 million bond was issued last year for the redevelopment project directly across the street — a strong signal of area revitalization and investor confidence.​ Comparable renovated units across the street rent for around $1,600 ($1500 if subsidized) per month, underscoring the significant rent growth potential.​

This is your chance to acquire a proven cash-flow opportunity in one of Atlanta’s fastest-growing submarkets.​ Attractive financing is available.​

details.marketingDescription:
CBRE  is pleased to present the rare opportunity to acquire the historic former campus of the Lutheran Theological Southern Seminary, most recently operated by Lenoir-Rhyne University.​ Situated on +17.65 acres in Columbia’s North Main Street (Noma) district, the campus offers over +130,000 square feet of existing infrastructure included in its core campus, five residential homes, and two multifamily properties.​ With historic buildings such as Beam Hall constructed in 1911, the campus combines historic architecture with modern amenities including a chapel, auditorium, library, student housing, and a recently constructed Occupational Therapy Education Facility.​ This offering presents a unique opportunity for a legacy campus in rapidly growing South Carolina.​

Founded in 1830, the former Lutheran Theological Southern Seminary operated in various cities across South Carolina before establishing a permanent campus in the Seminary Ridge neighborhood of Columbia in 1911

NOTICE HEART OF TEXAS HILL COUNTRY THE LEGENDARY “RIVER RANCH RV RESORT,” A FIVE-STAR BOUTIQUE 53-SITE RV PARK, IS FOR SALE.​ NESTLED ON THE BANKS OF THE GUADALUPE RIVER IN NEW BRAUNFELS, TEXAS — “THE FASTEST GROWING CITY IN AMERICA,” RANKING SECOND FOR ITS RECORD-BREAKING POPULATION GROWTH.​ NATIONALLY ACCLAIMED AS ONE OF THE TOP TEN BEST PLACES TO LIVE & VISIT IN AMERICA BY MONEY MAGAZINE AND NAMED ONE OF THE “7 MOST CHARMING RIVER TOWNS IN THE ENTIRE UNITED STATES” (2024) BY WORLD ATLAS.​ A GOOD SAMS PARK AND RATED 5 STARS BY WOODALL.​ THE PARK BOASTS 90% OCCUPANCY YEAR-ROUND.​ THIS TURN-KEY OPPORTUNITY PROVIDES INVESTORS A BEST-IN-CLASS INVESTMENT IN ONE OF THE MOST DESIRABLE MARKETS IN THE STATE OF TEXAS.​

THE GUADALUPE RIVER AT RIVER RANCH RV RESORT

THE GUADALUPE RIVER AT RIVER RANCH RV RESORT CAN BE DEFINED BY ITS TOWERING BALD CYPRESS TREES, WHICH FORM A LIVING CATHEDRAL CANOPY OVER THE CLEAR WATERS FOR KAYAKERS AND TUBERS.​ THE HISTORIC ARCHED BRIDGES AND LIMESTONE BLUFFS CREATE A MYSTICAL BACKDROP ALONG THE WINDING PATH THROUGH THE TEXAS HILL COUNTRY.​

PARK OVERVIEW STRUCTURES & AMENITIES

THE RIVER RANCH RV RESORT STRUCTURES & FACILITIES ARE COMPRISED OF A FULL-SERVICE RV PARK WITH 53 PREMIUM LEVELED CONCRETE SITES, BOAT RAMP, SOUVENIR BAIT & TACKLE SHOP, OFFICE, ONSITE KAYAK RENTAL SERVICE, SEPARATE MEN’S & WOMEN’S RESTROOM & SHOWER FACILITIES, LAUNDROMAT W/ COIN-OPERATED WASHERS & DRYERS, CHANGE DISPENSER, DETERGENT VENDING MACHINE, LARGE APARTMENT RENTAL W/ PRIVATE BALCONY, ENTERTAINMENT PARTY DECK PAVILION, EQUIPMENT STOREROOM, DOG PARK, VOLLEYBALL COURT, CABLE TV, WIFI.​ THE PARK MAINTAINS BOOKINGS YEAR-ROUND.​

PARK INFRASTRUCTURE

EXPANSIVE RIVER FRONTAGE, 53 OVERSIZED CONCRETE PAD SITES W/ DOUBLE PARKING & GRASSY PICNIC AREAS, FULL HOOK-UPS WITH 20/30/50 AMP ELECTRIC SERVICE, SEWER & WATER.​ CONCRETE-PAVED ROADS WITH OVERSIZED TURNING RADII — BIG RIG FRIENDLY.​ HIGH-VISIBILITY SIGNAGE — THE SOARING SIGN CAN BE SEEN FOR MILES AND IS FAMOUS IN ITSELF.​ THE PARK IS LOCATED NEAR I-35 WITH A TRAFFIC COUNT OF OVER 150,000 VEHICLES A DAY, PROVIDING EASY ACCESS TO THE PARK.​

TOTAL SITES: 53

  • ​

    GREENBELT SITES WILL ACCOMMODATE MOTORHOMES UP TO 40 FT – 12

  • ​

    RIVERFRONT SITES WILL ACCOMMODATE RIGS UP TO 50 FT – 6

    SELECT SITES WILL ACCOMMODATE RIGS UP TO 34 FT – 12

SOUVENIR BAIT & TACKLE SHOP

·       KAYAK RENTALS

·       FISHING TACKLE, LURES, RODS & REELS

·       BAIT (STARTING SEPTEMBER 1ST, LICENSED TO SELL LIVE BAIT)

ENTERTAINMENT PARTY DECK PAVILION

APARTMENT WITH PRIVATE BALCONY

CHARMING LARGE FULLY FURNISHED STUDIO APARTMENT FEATURES LIVING AREA, DINING, FULLY EQUIPPED CHEF’S KITCHEN W/ GRANITE COUNTERTOPS, CUSTOM CABINETRY, APPLIANCES, SPACIOUS BATHROOM, AND CUSTOM-BUILT DECKED PATIO BALCONY.​

THE LAUNDROMAT

THE ON-SITE LAUNDROMAT OFFERS COMMERCIAL COIN-OPERATED WASHERS & DRYERS, A CHANGE MACHINE, DETERGENT VENDING MACHINE, AND A FOLDING TABLE.​

LOCATION — NEW BRAUNFELS

THE CITY OF NEW BRAUNFELS IS LOCATED IN THE HEART OF THE TEXAS HILL COUNTRY BETWEEN SAN ANTONIO AND AUSTIN, TEXAS.​ THE CITY HAS A THRIVING ECONOMY DUE TO ITS HIGH RATES OF POPULATION, HOUSING, AND BUSINESS GROWTH, DRIVEN BY ITS MONUMENTAL LOCATION BETWEEN SAN ANTONIO AND AUSTIN.​

Perfect for Luxury Living and Investment

name: 100 +/- Site MH/RV Park - Greater Sacramento Market

details.investmentHighlights:
— Attractive Returns: Double-digit cash-on-cash and high-teens IRR projected by Year 5

— Expansion Opportunity: ~17.5 acres with room for new MH/RV sites or Boat/RV storage

— Strong In-Place Cash Flow: 100+/- site, age-restricted community with nearly 100% occupancy

— Organic Rent Growth: Legacy rents offer natural upside with no major CapEx needed

— Supply-Constrained Market: Northern CA faces low MH/RV supply and rising affordability needs

— Low Turnover Tenant Base: 55+ tenants provide long-term occupancy and strong payment history
details.marketingDescription:
This 100+/- site, age-restricted MH/RV community presents a compelling opportunity to acquire a stable, income-producing asset with built-in long-term upside in Northern California’s increasingly supply-constrained housing market.​ Situated on nearly 40+/- acres, the property is operating at near-full occupancy, backed by a long-tenured 55+ resident base and a strong history of consistent collections.​

The community has been under long-term ownership and features a seasoned on-site manager supported by third-party oversight, offering investors a turnkey, low-touch operation with minimal staffing or oversight demands.​ The age-restricted nature of the property results in virtually no site turnover, making it especially attractive for those seeking predictable, recession-resilient cash flow.​

Additional value lies in the underutilized acreage, offering a clear path to future growth.​ Whether through the development of new MH or RV sites or the addition of income-generating RV or boat storage, the property offers multiple expansion avenues depending on investor strategy.​

Strategically located in a region experiencing chronic affordable housing shortages and growing demand for age-restricted living, the property benefits from strong demographic trends and limited competition.​ Combined with projected double-digit cash-on-cash returns by Year 5 and a high-teens IRR, this offering represents a rare chance to secure a well-positioned, yield-driven investment in a market where quality MH/RV assets are rarely brought to market.​

PLEASE READ BEFORE REACHING OUT OR REQUESTING MORE INFORMATION

details.marketingDescription:
SRS National Net Lease is pleased to offer the opportunity to acquire the fee simple interest (land & building ownership) in a NN leased, GPM Investments, LLC investment property located in Grapevine, Texas.​ The tenant, GPM Southeast, LLC, recently signed a brand new, 10-year lease extension, bringing the remaining lease term 12 years with 2 (5-year) to extend, demonstrating their commitment to the site.​ The lease features 5% rental increases every 5 years throughout the initial term and at the beginning of each option period, steadily growing NOI and hedging against inflation.​ The lease is NN with limited landlord responsibilities making it an ideal, low management investment opportunity for a passive investor.​ The property recently underwent renovations valued at approximately $290,000, which included renovations to the asset’s parking areas.​

The subject property is located near the intersection of State Highway 121 and Interstate 635 which combine to average over 261,000 vehicles passing by daily.​ State Highway 121 is the major retail and commuter thoroughfare serving the city of Grapevine.​ The asset is located approximately 1 mile from Grapevine Mills, a 1.70+ million square foot shopping mall that includes national/credit tenants such as Nike, Legoland, AMC, Neiman Marcus, Chick-fil-A, Chipotle, and many others.​ The asset is also located in the center of a primary distribution hub that includes distribution centers for companies such as Amazon, McKesson, Boeing, Lowe’s, USPS, The Container Store, and many more.​ The property is in the center of a primary retail corridor with other nearby national/credit tenants including a Bass Pro Shops, Target, Main Event, McDonald’s, In-N-Out, Olive Garden, and more, further increasing consumer traffic to the site.​ The 5-mile trade area is supported by a population of over 172,000 residents and 132,500 employees with an average household income of $161,095.​

Coldwell Banker Realty is pleased to present the opportunity to acquire a highly visible, income-producing retail center located on two parcels, 1747 Live Oak Boulevard and 451 Queens Avenue positioned in the heart of Yuba City, California.​
This well-positioned strip mall is situated on a prominent commercial corridor with strong traffic counts and excellent exposure.​ The property sits on a ± 2.27-acre parcel and offers ±26,300 square feet of gross leasable area across multiple suites, providing stable in-place income and future lease-up or repositioning upside.​
Currently configured with a diverse tenant mix of local and regional businesses, North Pointe Shopping Center offers a balanced combination of service-oriented and retail uses.​ Ample on-site parking, prominent signage, and multiple points of ingress and egress enhance convenience and visibility for customers and tenants alike.​ The property is zoned for commercial use, allowing a wide range of potential tenants and uses.​
Recent improvements include upgraded HVAC systems, exterior painting, and ongoing unit renovations, ensuring minimal capital expenditures for a new owner.​ Strategically located near residential neighborhoods, schools, and other retail anchors, the property benefits from a steady consumer base and strong daytime foot traffic.​ The area continues to experience steady economic growth and population expansion, making it a compelling market for investors seeking yield, stability, and long-term appreciation.​
1747 Live Oak Boulevard & 451 Queens Avenue represents a rare opportunity to acquire a well-maintained retail asset in a thriving Northern California submarket with value-add potential and stable cash flow.​

TENANT HIGHLIGHTS

• Postino has ±34 locations across 7 states (Arizona, California, Colorado, Texas, Georgia, Tennessee, and North Carolina), and continuing to grow

• Operated by Upward Projects, a hospitality group headquartered in Phoenix, AZ with 5 concepts spanning 40 locations

• Upward Projects oversees several unique restaurant brands such as, Postino, Joyride Taco House, Federal Pizza, Windsor and Churn

• Ranked #28 on Nation’s Restaurant News’ 2025 “100 Under 100” list, recognizing top emerging restaurant brands with fewer than 100 locations (Source)

LOCATION HIGHLIGHTS

• Located within the vibrant retail corridor of The Orchard Town Center—a 155-acre open-air shopping destination featuring major tenants like Target, AMC, Macy’s, and more

• Densely populated trade area with over 197,267 residents in a 5-mile radius

details.marketingDescription:
Cushman & Wakefield is pleased to present the opportunity to acquire a premier Absolute NNN lease investment located at 14588 Delaware Street in Westminster, Colorado.​ This brand-new 2025 construction is leased to Postino, a rapidly expanding restaurant brand backed by a corporate guaranty and secured with a long-term 15-year lease.​ With zero landlord responsibilities, the property offers investors a more passive income stream and long-term stability.​

Postino currently operates ±34 locations across seven states, including Arizona, California, Colorado, Texas, Georgia, Tennessee, and North Carolina, and continues to grow under the leadership of Upward Projects.​ Headquartered in Phoenix, Upward Projects is a nationally recognized hospitality group with five distinct concepts spanning 40 locations.​ Their portfolio includes highly acclaimed restaurant brands such as Postino, Joyride Taco House, Federal Pizza, Windsor, and Churn.​ In 2025, Postino was ranked #28 on Nation’s Restaurant News’ “100 Under 100” list, which highlights the top emerging restaurant brands with fewer than 100 locations nationwide.​

The property is strategically positioned within The Orchard Town Center, a 155-acre open-air shopping destination anchored by Target, AMC, Macy’s, and other major national retailers.​ The site benefits from excellent visibility along Interstate 25, which sees approximately 112,276 vehicles per day, and is supported by strong surrounding demographics, with over 197,000 residents within a five-mile radius and average household incomes exceeding $176,000 within three miles.​

This offering represents a rare opportunity to acquire a brand-new, long-term Absolute NNN lease asset tenanted by one of the country’s most dynamic and growing restaurant groups, located in a thriving retail corridor within the Denver metropolitan area.​
details.name: Postino - Corporate Abs NNN Lease - Brand New Construction

details.marketingDescription:
Marcus & Millichap is pleased to announce the exclusive listing of Marshall Townhomes, comprised of 12-townhome units located within the Summit Hill Neighborhood of Saint Paul, Minnesota.​ 708-730 Marshall Avenue is being offered for sale on a free-and-clear basis.​

Built in 1981, Marshall Townhomes consists of one building on a 0.93-acre parcel, conveniently positioned between Downtown Saint Paul (2.5 miles) and Downtown Minneapolis (8 miles).​ The unit mix includes: one two-bedroom/one-bathroom unit at 650 square feet, seven two-bedroom/one-bathroom units at 850 square feet, two three-bedroom/one and one half-bathroom at 1725 square feet, and two four-bedroom/one and one half-bathroom units at 1980 square feet.​ Each unit is equipped with A/C wall units and individual furnaces for heating and cooling.​ Tenants benefit from the spacious unit layouts, in-unit laundry, patios, backyard space, and off-street parking.​

The property has been well maintained, with consistent improvements throughout.​ All units have been updated within the last ten years and have received continued as-needed updates as units turn.​ Since acquiring the property in 2022, the current owner has replaced nearly all appliances and has fully renovated five units.​ These updates include, but are not limited to: flooring, counter tops, cabinets, appliances, toilets, electrical fixtures, bathrooms, and vanities.​ Furthermore, all windows have been replaced since the building was built, with the current owner replacing about 30% of the windows within the last few years.​ Additionally, the roof was replaced in 2022.​

This offering presents an opportunity to acquire a stabilized asset with favorable assumable financing in place.​ Looking forward, investors can capitalize on multiple value-add strategies, including rent increases, capturing additional parking income, and continued unit upgrades.​ Furthermore, at loan maturity in 2032, the site presents significant redevelopment potential, with the ability to add as many as 75+ apartment units.​ Thanks to the lot size and existing zoning, no variances are required—allowing the next owner to bypass the planning commission process and streamline redevelopment.​
details.name: Marshall Townhomes

details.marketingDescription:
1450 Merrill St, known as “Seadowns”, is a three-building, nine-unit property that has been owned by the seller for 26 years.​ It is in close proximity to area beaches, East Cliff Drive, Pleasure Point, the Santa Cruz Small Craft Harbor, Sunday Live Oak farmer's market, Simpkins Swim Center and many local restaurants.​ The property contains ample outdoor space, providing a peaceful living experience for the renters.​ The property provides excellent walkability and bikeability.​ It also has 11 parking spaces, including 5 covered carport spaces.​ The coin-operated laundry is leased by the owner.​

The unit mix includes six 1-bedroom, 1-bath units (1-6) in the two-story building.​ Each of these six units has access to the outdoor space behind the building and has additional locked storage in the carport.​ Near the front of the property is a 2-bedroom, 1-bath unit (A) with a large fenced front yard, a 1 bedroom, 1-bath unit (B) with a fenced back yard and covered patio, and a stand-alone 2-bedroon, 1-bath unit (C).​

The owner has completed recent improvements including a new sewer lateral, new roof on the carport and laundry area, and fumigation for termites.​ Between turnovers, the Landlord has also painted the units, and updated appliances and fixtures, and installed new carpets.​

details.marketingDescription:
83 Orchard Hill Park is a Class A Office building located on the grounds of a national anchored Retail Power Center.​ This 6,300 square foot freestanding building was designed for a single user as a national headquarters, and is particularly ideal for office owner occupants who value retail-level visibility.​ The interior structure features contemporary, colonial architecture with the finest appointed materials, and includes an array of amenities such as full gym, master office suite with fireplace and large floor to ceiling arch windows, outdoor grill patio, kitchen, conference room, and ample parking.​ Some ideal users include Legal, Financial, Medical, Insurance, Real Estate, and Technology companies.​ The building is well-suited for 8-20 employees and premier furniture is available upon request.​

83 Orchard Hill Park is located minutes from the intersection of Route 2 and Interstate 190, offering excellent visibility and premium presence to service the North Worcester County trade area and Route 2 Corridor.​

details.marketingDescription:
Ideally positioned in the heart of Dayton’s Central Business District along Webster Street between East 1st and East 2nd Streets, The Firefly was originally constructed in 1920 and underwent a complete historic renovation in 2001– 2002.​ The renovation transformed the building into loft-style creative office and residential condominiums, blending authentic architectural character with modern amenities.​

The four-story building with a lower level consists of three (3) residential condo units (not included in this offering) and one commercial condo.​ The commercial condominium, which is the subject of this offering, includes approximately 24,570 square feet of high-quality office space, 4,719 square feet of lower-level storage and unconditioned space (formerly leased as a photography studio), and a six-space parking garage totaling ±1,333 square feet.​

The location is one of the top rental markets in Boston due to its attractive high-density neighborhoods, quality of life amenities, transportation, universities and highway. The property boasts strong demographics with a population over 304,277 within a 3 mile radius. The average apartment rental in the immediate area ranges from $2,700-$3,500 per month. 

 

Value-Add

The opportunity exists to increase rental income with strategic renovations and abilities to convert some of the two-bedroom units into three-bedroom units. 

 

Transit Oriented 

This ideal location provides residents with easy transit access to the  B, and C,  Green lines as well as multiple bus stops, countless Buses Routes with an 18 minute ride to Logan Airport. 

 

Location

Nestled between Commonwealth Avenue and Beacon Street the location offers amenities within walking distance such as biking trail around the reservoir, restaurants, night-life,  food markets such as Whole Foods, Star Market, and Trader Jose's. The property is close distance to Boston College, Brookline, and Chestnut Hill. 

 

Points of Interest: 

 

Whole Foods: .3 miles

Star Market: .8 miles

Chiswick B Line T: .1 miles

Cleveland Circle C Line T: .2 miles

Longwood Medical: 1.3 miles

Logan Airport: 5.4 miles
details.marketingDescription:
North Shore Realty Advisors, Inc.​, as exclusive agent, is excited to present The Selkirk Place Apartments located at 56-58 Selkirk Road in the Cleveland Circle neighborhood of Brighton, Massachusetts, between Boston University and Boston College.​ This beautiful, well-maintained thirty (30) unit is a 4-story red brick asset with an attractive unit-mix of seventeen (17) one-bedroom, thirteen (13) two-bedroom units with three (3) surface tandem parking spots.​ The total livable square footage is 25,960 ± square feet, situated on a 13,275-square-foot lot.​

This rare iconic apartment building is nestled on a quiet road between Commonwealth Avenue and Beacon Street, with walking distance to both “C” Line (Beacon St.​) and “B” Line (Comm.​ Ave) for the MBTA Greenline.​ Selkirk Place Apartments features open floor plans with a plethora of natural light, hardwood floors, high ceilings, eat-in kitchens, private outdoor space, and oversized bedrooms, along with bicycle storage and laundry facilities.​ The classic 1930s vintage charm is featured throughout the building and combined with today’s modern-day standards of living, which draws residents and a strong rental history for the asset.​ Assumable Debt is available at 4.5% Interest Rate.​

details.investmentHighlights: Investment Opportunity - listing price based on strong net operating income (NOI)
details.marketingDescription:
Discover Southern hospitality at its finest at Chateau Bourbon, a highly profitable,
purpose built, award-winning bed and breakfast.​ Located in Prospect, minutes
from vibrant downtown Louisville, KY.​ This elegant four guest room Select Registry
inn presents a rare opportunity to own a highly acclaimed hospitality property
that seamlessly blends upscale charm, modern luxury, and a welcoming,
bourbon-inspired atmosphere.​ Each guest room is beautifully appointed,
featuring luxurious en-suite bathrooms, custom furnishings, and curated decor
that celebrates Kentucky’s iconic spirit.​

Located in the sought-after Norton Commons neighborhood, the property is
situated within a New Urbanist master-planned community known for its
walkable streets, wide choice of fine dining, boutiques, and lively community
events.​ Chateau Bourbon is an official partner of the Kentucky Bourbon Trail,
and in close proximity to several distilleries and tours.​ Guests also have access to
three community swimming pools as well as a variety of nearby outdoor nature
activities.​

Chateau Bourbon’s guests enjoy indulgent, chef-prepared breakfasts,
complimentary bourbon tastings, and personalized service that has earned
national recognition and a loyal following.​ The property includes private
owner’s/manager’s quarters, a commercial-grade kitchen, a classic front porch,
and spacious indoor and outdoor common areas ideal for guest gatherings or
private events.​

With a consistent track record of strong occupancy, excellent financial
performance, glowing reviews, and media coverage, Chateau Bourbon is ideal for
both new and experienced innkeepers or lifestyle investors seeking a unique,
profitable venture in one of Kentucky’s most desirable areas.​

Whether you’re welcoming Derby-goers, international thoroughbred horse
afficionados, bourbon trail travelers, or experience-driven guests, this
exceptional bed and breakfast offers the perfect blend of sophistication, warmth,
and opportunity—an investment as rewarding as the guest experience it
delivers.​

details.marketingDescription:
One of America’s best deals in a best of class market with a very high barrier to entry.​ Superior 1031.​ Originally priced at $9.6M.​ Just reduced for a FAST market sale!

DWG Capital Group is thrilled to present an exceptional opportunity to invest in GATE 52 (formerly known as SAVELIVE), a newly constructed STNL Class A Retail property, featuring a NNN National Tenant in the thriving tri-city Fayetteville, Arkansas—the proud home of the Razorbacks (University of Arkansas).​ This high-volume, thriving Class A Quick Service Restaurant (QSR) combines a live concert venue, restaurant, brewery, and headquarters into a single dynamic space.​ Priced competitively at $7,700,000, this property stands out in the market with a 7.5% cap rate, making it an attractive option for discerning investors seeking reliable returns.​

About The Property & Tenant

GATE 52 benefits from a 20-year corporately guaranteed absolute NNN lease, with 16 years remaining, backed by a robust tenant with a proven track record across eight additional essential locations.​ This level of security is increasingly rare in today's market, offering peace of mind and stable income for years to come.​ The lease features 5% escalations every five years, ensuring a steady increase in returns.​

  • ​

    Asking price: $7,700,000

  • ​

    7.5% cap rate

  • ​

    20-year NNN lease

  • ​

    NOI: $577,600 per year

  • ​

    Price per SF: $308 per SF

  • ​

    $1.93 per SF/month rental rate

  • ​

    Lease Term: Originally a 20-year lease with 16 years remaining, including two 10-year renewal options.​ The first two years were spent expanding 40% of the building with brand-new demand driven construction.​

Strategic Location

Situated at 3615 N.​ Steele St, Fayetteville, AR 72704, GATE 52 is not just a property; it’s a destination.​ The building spans 24,925 square feet and is thoughtfully designed to include a restaurant, brewery, headquarters, and concert venue.​ Originally constructed in 2016 and expanded in 2021, this architecturally striking two-story establishment is positioned perfectly on 3.26 acres of prime real estate.​ The site enjoys high visibility and foot traffic, enhancing its appeal as a premier investment.​

Thriving Urban Market

GATE 52 is located in an excellent urban commercial area within a dense new retail corridor in Fayetteville, a vibrant college town.​ The property is near a newly built Whole Foods Market and adjacent to major retailers like Target and Kohl's, alongside a new bank and a Walmart Supercenter.​ Its proximity to one of the city’s newest high-price-per-door Class A apartment complexes further underscores its strategic location.​ The surrounding area benefits from high traffic counts, making it an ideal spot for a successful retail operation.​

Easy access to I-49 and I-79 connects GATE 52 to the entire Fayetteville/Bentonville/Rogers area within the Northwest Arkansas Tri-State Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA).​ This region is home to major employers, including Walmart, JB Hunt, Tyson Chicken, and the University of Arkansas.​ With a robust local economy and a diverse employment base, the property stands to benefit from a steady influx of customers and potential clientele.​

Marcus & Millichap is proud to present the opportunity to acquire Driftwood Manor, a well-built, well-maintained 12-unit multifamily asset ideally situated in a quiet neighborhood in Sparks, Nevada.​ Located near both Victorian Square and the Sparks Marina, the property offers residents a convenient location to enjoy the frequentconcerts and events that occur year-round, also offering ease of access being 5-minutes to Interstate-80 and within 20-minutes to numerous employment centersincluding the Tahoe-Reno Industrial Center (TRI-Center) that supports the dozens of employers and thousands of jobs.​

Driftwood Manor was originally built in 1963 and constructed of masonry framing, concrete block exteriors, and a stone façade at the entrance.​ The unit mix consists of all one-bedroom / one-bath units with an average square footage of 643sf per unit.​ A majority of the units have received consistent upgrades featuring a full kitchen appliance package including refrigerator, stove, microwave & dishwasher, new cabinetry and hardware, luxury vinyl plank flooring, LED light fixtures, ceiling fans in the bedrooms, kitchen and bathroom faucets, and full interior paint.​ There are a few remaining, unrenovated units that have an approximate $150 rent delta compared to the upgraded units.​ Additionally, current ownership has painted the asset, installed new exterior lighting, and replaced the sewer main, along with numerous interior upgrades.​ The property offers off-street parking, on-site laundry, and easy-to-care-for landscaping

details.marketingDescription:
SRS National Net Lease is pleased to offer the opportunity to acquire a leased fee (land ownership) absolute NNN leased, Chick-fil-A investment property located in Long Beach, California.​ The tenant, Chick-fil-A, Inc has 13 years remaining on their lease with 7 (5-year) options to extend, demonstrating their commitment to the site.​ The lease features 10% rental increases every 5 years throughout the initial term and at the beginning of each option period, steadily growing NOI and hedging against inflation.​ The lease is absolute NNN with zero landlord responsibilities making it an ideal, management free investment opportunity for an out of state investor.​

The Chick-fil-A is located along the heavily trafficked, signalized intersection of Atlantic Avenue and East 33rd Street, with a combined traffic count of approximately 33,500 vehicles per day.​ Atlantic Avenue serves as one of the primary north-south retail arteries through Long Beach, providing direct access to Interstate 405 (300,000 VPD).​ The property is an outparcel to a Target-anchored shopping center that also features national and credit tenants such as Ross Dress for Less, Petco, Best Buy, and The Home Depot.​ In addition, the site is surrounded by numerous major retailers including Costco, ALDI, Marshalls, Vons, and Walgreens, further driving consistent consumer traffic to the corridor.​ The asset benefits from its strategic infill location within the Bixby Knolls submarket, one of Long Beach’s most established and desirable neighborhoods.​ The 5-mile trade area boasts a population exceeding 588,000 residents with an average household income of approximately $115,000, supporting strong year-round retail demand.​

details.investmentHighlights:

  • ​Year Renovated 2018

  • ​Number Of Parking Spaces 251
  • ​It is also includes a parking garage and that address is 8 S 4th St.
  • ​Property Video link-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-a9iiGly-1U&feature=youtu.be
details.marketingDescription:
The Hub, located at 7 S 4th Street in Council Bluffs, Iowa, is a 35,002 square foot multi-tenant commercial building situated on 1.81 acres.​ It’s currently configured into three distinct suites, each with its own private entrance, allowing for maximum flexibility in occupancy and future use.​ Two of the spaces are currently operated by the owner and generate significant traffic.​ The Hub Trampoline Park—featuring trampolines, a ninja obstacle course, Axe Throwing, and Party Rooms—serves as the only large-scale indoor family entertainment center in Council Bluffs.​ Alongside it, Wonderbowl operates as a restaurant and bar with outdoor pickleball courts and a fully built-out patio event space.​ Combined, these businesses attract an estimated 3,000 to 6,000 visitors per month, creating an already established base of consistent foot traffic.​

Approximately 8,500 square feet of the building remains vacant.​ Previously occupied by a cheerleading and tumbling program that served hundreds of student-athletes annually, this space is open, high-ceilinged, and move-in ready.​ It presents an immediate opportunity for an owner-user to establish or expand operations in a location that already draws families and activity-seekers from Council Bluffs and surrounding towns.​ The space would be ideal for a gymnastics gym, indoor sports courts, fitness training, batting cages, dance studio, or a golf simulator business.​ The environment has already proven successful for youth and family-focused programming.​

Included in the sale is a separate, three-level parking garage totaling 59,750 square feet with 251 stalls.​ At present, only about 70% of is leased, which represents a major value-add opportunity for a buyer interested in maximizing recurring income.​ With additional leasing or event-based parking strategies, this portion of the asset could become a significant revenue stream on its own.​

The current owner is willing to lease back the trampoline park and restaurant/bar portions of the building, providing immediate, stable income to a new owner.​ There is also an assumable loan in place offering financing efficiency for qualified buyers.​ Zoned C-4, The Hub is structurally sound, visibility strong, and use options broad.​ For an investor looking for stable income with upside, or for a business owner seeking a space that offers both scale and a built-in audience, The Hub is a compelling acquisition with real growth potential.​

Recent appraisal suggests a value of $4,450,000.​
details.name: The Hub CB

name: MISSION PET HEALTH PORTFOLIO | 840+ UNIT OPERATOR
description: ±11 YEAR LEASES | AUSTIN MSA | 2% ANNUAL INCREASES | 840+ UNIT GTY

locations.fullAddress: 1210 E New Hope Dr, Cedar Park, Williamson County, TX 78613
1401 Chris Kelley Blvd, Hutto, TX 78634

details.investmentHighlights:
Stable, Long-Term Investments | Options To Extend

There are just under 12 years remaining on the leases, each with one, five-year option to extend.

Comprehensive Veterinary Services

New Hope Animal Hospital offers exams and consultations, vaccinations, spay & neuter, dental care, microchipping, surgery, diagnostics, pharmaceutical services, urgent care, and exotic pet care.

Daylily Animal Hospital offers pet preventative medicine, urgent care, wellness exams, spay & neuter, vaccinations, surgery, dental care, diagnostics, microchipping, pharmaceutical services, and pet boarding services 7 days a week.

Scheduled Rent Increases | Hedge Against Inflation

The leases feature 2% annual rental increases, providing a future owner with a boost in cash flow and a hedge against inflation throughout the life of their investments.

Mission Pet Health Corporate Guaranty

The lease features a corporate guaranty from Mission Pet Health, one of the largest and most reputable veterinary networks in the country. In December 2024, Southern Veterinary Partners merged with Mission Veterinary Partners, bringing together two industry leading operators. The combined group now includes over 840+ hospitals across 41 states, supported by a team of more than 20,000 professionals, significantly enhancing the credit profile and long-term stability of the tenant.

Secure Financial Backing | Shore Capital Partners

Founded in 2009, Shore Capital Partners is a Chicago-based private equity firm with 77 platform investments and approximately $12.5 billion in assets under management, known for its hands-on, growth-oriented approach to building founder-led businesses. In 2014, Shore launched Southern Veterinary Partners (SVP) with just three clinics, followed by the formation of Mission Veterinary Partners (MVP) in 2017. By 2024, the two platforms had scaled to over 840 hospitals across 41 states. That same year, Shore partnered with Silver Lake to merge SVP and MVP in an $8.6 billion recapitalization, creating one of the largest veterinary platforms in the U.S. and solidifying Shore’s reputation as a leading healthcare investor.

AAHA (American Animal Hospital Association) Accredited Hospitals

The American Animal Hospital Association (AAHA) sets the benchmark for excellence in companion-animal veterinary care. Earned by only about 15% of veterinary practices in the U.S., AAHA accreditation signifies that a hospital meets or exceeds over 900 rigorous standards covering patient care, safety, and operational performance, assuring clients of the highest level of veterinary service. Accredited practices consistently experience measurable business advantages, including higher revenue, stronger client retention, increased new-patient growth, and reduced client attrition.

Built-To-Suit Class A Veterinary Facilities

Both hospitals were built from the ground up in 2017 and 2020 as state-ofthe-art, purpose-built veterinary facilities specifically designed to meet the operational needs of today’s leading veterinary groups, ensuring long-term functionality, efficiency, and durability.

Favorable Demographics

New Hope Animal Hospital caters to more than 220,000 residents within a 5-mile radius with an average household income exceeding $135,000.

Daylily Animal Hospital caters to more than 148,000 residents within a 5-mile radius with an average household income exceeding $132,000.

Healthcare Real Estate | Recession Resistant Property

Veterinary hospitals are extremely sought-after investments for their resistance to downturns in the economy and e-commerce trends that affect traditional retail properties.

Prime Locations

New Hope Animal Hospital is positioned adjacent to The Parke, a 405,000 SF regional shopping center featuring retailers such as Whole Foods, Nordstrom Rack, and Dick’s Sporting Goods, and across from 1890 Ranch, a 900,000 SF lifestyle center anchored by Cinemark, Super Target, and Academy Sports + Outdoors. Just 1.5 miles east, the CedarView development is transforming the corridor with a 118- acre mixed-use destination featuring a 1.1 million SF Nebraska Furniture Mart, a 240,000 SF Scheels Sporting Goods, and a 300-room Marriott Hotel & Convention Center.

Daylily Animal Hospital sits directly off Chris Kelley Blvd, which sees over 18,000 vehicles per day, and is located just one mile from Hanson’s Corner and Townwest Commons, two of Hutto’s premier retail destinations totaling more than 500,000 square feet and featuring national retailers such as Lowe’s Home Improvement, The Home Depot, Petco, Chipotle, McDonald’s, Taco Bell, Chick-fil-A, and Starbucks. The hospital is surrounded by thousands of homes and several major nearby developments, including Huggins Crossing, a 113-acre mixed-use project less than one mile away featuring 600 multifamily units, 60,000 square feet of retail and restaurant space, a grocery store, hotel/medical component, and 700,000 square feet of logistics facilities projected to create nearly 1,000 jobs. Hutto’s population grew 9.4% to 42,661 residents from July 2023 to July 2024, the fastest growth rate among all Austin suburbs, and was recently ranked No. 13 nationwide among U.S. cities with at least 20,000 residents, according to newly released U.S. Census Bureau data.

Tax Free / Top Destination State

Texas is one of nine states with no personal income tax, offering potential tax advantages for investors. According to U.S. Census data, Texas led the nation in net domestic migration in 2024.

Robust Industry Growth

The global veterinary services market, valued at $150 billion in 2024, is projected to grow at a 8.7% CAGR from 2023 to 2030.

Austin MSA

Austin, Texas continues to surge as one of the nation’s fastest-growing metros, now home to over 2.55 million residents, an 11% population increase since 2020 and more than 27% growth over the past decade. Anchored by a diverse and rapidly expanding economy, Austin has emerged as a premier destination for Fortune 500 companies and innovative startups alike. Global leaders such as Apple, Samsung, and Tesla have made major investments in the region, driving waves of new jobs, infrastructure, and housing development. Supported by Texas’ pro-business climate, low taxes, and streamlined regulatory environment, Austin continues to attract top talent and corporate capital, solidifying its reputation as one of the most vibrant, high-growth markets for business, innovation, and real estate investment in the United States.

Tenant Investment In Location

Pet hospitals rarely relocate due to difficulty retaining the same patients in a new location and the high costs associated with moving and buildouts.

details.marketingDescription:
For registration requirements and regulations, please review here or contact Hannah Ladenheim | 936-274-1332| hladenheim@crexi.​com.​

RIPCO Investment Sales is pleased to offer for sale 1355 North Maple Avenue in Bartow, Florida.​ Situated on ±2.98 acres, the site’s convenient location is approximately 12 miles to Lakeland, Florida, 45 miles to Downtown Tampa and 65 miles to Orlando.​ Located in one of the fastest-growing metropolitan areas in the country, the popularity of the Lakeland MSA is driven by factors such as a strong job market in healthcare, manufacturing, and distribution, along with the presence of affordable housing and a desirable location between Tampa and Orlando.​

The site currently features a 715 square foot office building with a property use code designation of radio/TV station and land description of commercial/industrial.​ The sale will include 3 radio towers, the 715 square foot building and a shed.​ The generator on the property will be moved prior to a sale.​ The parcel is located in the residential low 1 zoning district (RL-1).​ The purpose of the RL-1 district is to provide areas for the low-density residential needs of residents in urban areas who desire areas with larger-sized lots, a minimum of 40,000 square feet.​ Please contact Polk County’s Land Development Division for more information on this parcel.​

Bartow’s central location creates long-term advantages for both businesses and residents.​ Positioned near major highways like U.​S.​ 17, U.​S.​ 98, and State Road 60, Bartow offers convenient access to nearby larger cities while maintaining a slower pace and community-focused lifestyle.​ Bartow plays a central role in local government and is surrounded by industries such as phosphate mining, agriculture, and public services.​ The city is an ideal choice for families, young professionals, county government employees, and retirees alike.​ The city is a quieter alternative to Florida’s busier metros, appealing to those looking for affordability, space, and community without being too far from urban conveniences.​

Located within one of the most dynamic growth corridors in the Southeast, Bartow also offers access to a ready and skilled workforce supported by local training programs and educational institutions.​ Businesses benefit from available land, a pro-growth mindset, and proximity to larger regional markets.​ The local economy continues to grow with new commercial, residential, and industrial developments, all supported by thoughtful planning and strong public and private partnerships.​ Businesses benefit from Bartow’s direct access to freight rail and its proximity to one of the most rail-connected counties in Florida.​ Additionally, the Bartow Executive Airport and Industrial Park serve as critical assets, offering general aviation services, industrial space, on-site rail access, and logistical advantages that attract and support business growth.​ With nearby access to regional airports, seaports, and rail, Bartow is positioned as a gateway to statewide and national markets.​

Situated on almost one acre, the building is comprised of 5 apartment units and 5 store front retail units.​ Built in 1952, the community has been well maintained offering residential tenants 4 two-bedroom units and 1 one and a half-bedroom unit.​ The retail portion contains three spaces along Shoreline Drive, a well trafficked corridor with great visibility, with an additional two retail spaces in the back facing lake Minnetonka.​ Retail in this building ranges from 900 square feet to 1,706 square feet.​ Shore line Drive benefits from it’s position near the major intersection of Shadywood Rd and Shoreline Drive centrally located in the Lake Minnetonka area, the premier big lake area of Minnesota.​

For investors, Shoreline Drive presents a compelling opportunity to buy a rare asset with strong long-term fundamentals.​ This trophy asset is positioned for sustained rent growth, enhanced tenant demand, and durable value appreciation.​ Enhancements to unit interiors and common areas, including hallways, lobbies and landscaping, as well as the addition of other amenities, could further elevate the property’s profile and enhance the tenant experience.​

details.marketingDescription:
Property Overview

This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire an established, income-producing self-storage facility with proven performance and strong growth potential.​ The property recently completed a major expansion, adding 102 new units for a total of 211 units.​

Phase 1, opened in August 2019, demonstrated rapid lease-up—reaching 59% occupancy within six months and achieving full occupancy within one year.​ The newly completed Phase 2 expansion is poised to capture continued demand in this area.​

Located along Highway 20 with 244 feet of prime frontage, the facility offers outstanding visibility, easy access, and steady traffic exposure.​ Designed for efficiency and low maintenance, the property features a mix of unit sizes and modern amenities appealing to both residential and commercial tenants.​

With a strong operational history, modern technology systems, and expansion upside, this property offers investors a turnkey opportunity with stable cash flow and long-term value.​

details.marketingDescription:
SRS National Net Lease is pleased to offer the opportunity to acquire the fee simple interest (land & building ownership) in an absolute NNN leased Dutch Bros investment property located in Greenville, SC.​ The tenant, Dutch Bros, executed a 15-year lease with 3 (5-year) extension options, demonstrating their long-term commitment to this location.​ The lease features 10% rental increases every five years throughout the initial term and at the beginning of each option period, providing consistent NOI growth and a hedge against inflation.​ The lease is structured as absolute NNN with zero landlord responsibilities, making it an ideal, management-free investment opportunity for an out-of-state or passive investor.​

The Dutch Bros Coffee is strategically positioned along N.​ Pleasantburg Drive (37,100 VPD), a highly trafficked retail corridor in Greenville.​ The property benefits from strong co-tenancy and proximity to major national retailers including Lowe’s, ALDI, The Home Depot, Hobby Lobby, Burlington, Staples, Petco, and Goodwill.​ Additionally, Dutch Bros is located near Cherrydale Point, a power center anchored by T.​J.​ Maxx, Ross, Ingles, Old Navy, Crunch Fitness, Hibbett, Pet Supermarket, and Shoe Carnival, further reinforcing the site as a retail destination.​ The site is also supported by surrounding convenience and necessity-based retailers including O’Reilly Auto Parts, The Rim Doctor, Advance Auto Parts, and Public Storage, as well as neighborhood-serving centers such as Field Plaza Shopping Center, home to The Dream Center and other community-focused uses.​ This strong mix of daily-needs retailers and established national brands ensures consistent consumer traffic and enhances the long-term stability of the location.​

details.marketingDescription:
This building originally served as a bank but has been a multi-tenant retail building for over 30 years, with a pawn shop occupying the 2nd floor.​ The building owner, who also owned the pawn shop, has since retired and now leases half of the 2nd floor to a new pawn shop.​ The other half of the 2nd floor has been transformed into 7 new office/retail suites, accessible by an ADA lift or stairs.​ There is also an ADA bathroom on the 2nd floor.​

On the 1st floor, Unit A is occupied by a long-standing check cashing/money transfer company.​ The former pawn shop owner is leasing back the bank vault, and 3 tenants occupy 5 suites in Unit C.​ Of the 16 parking spaces, 11 are now being leased separately, with only 5 included with suite leases.​

This building offers significant value-add opportunities, including multi-family, commercial, or mixed-use development of the parking lot.​ An up to 7 story building with retail on the first floor and multi-family on the upper floors can be built on the currently parking lot.​ (See rendering in pictures) The property is located in am opportunity zone & a transit zone being only one block from BART and it is next door to the new housing development and the newly updated AC Transit International Blvd corridor.​

The property will stabilize this year as two of the new units and two of the parking spaces have already been leased in the first 30 days of being available.​

For additional information visit https://aicrepartners.​com/for-sale/

details.marketingDescription: Cast Capital Partners is pleased to present the Louis Bank of Commerce, a rare opportunity to acquire one of San Diego’s most architecturally significant commercial properties.​ Built in 1888 and renowned as the Queen of the Gaslamp, this four-story Baroque Revival landmark blends historic charm with modern functionality.​ Over the years, it has hosted a variety of tenants, from Madame Cora’s Golden Poppy Hotel brothel to creative offices and popular restaurants.​ The building has been fully restored, showcasing its original hardwood floors, soaring ceilings, and exposed brick walls, offering a unique blend of old-world character and contemporary appeal.​ Located in the heart of the vibrant Gaslamp Quarter, the property is surrounded by top-tier dining, entertainment, and hospitality destinations, ensuring strong year-round demand.​ The Louis Bank of Commerce presents an excellent opportunity for investors seeking to reposition this iconic asset for long-term value.​ With its potential for conversion into a boutique hotel, featuring 36 rooms (subject to buyer’s yield study), or adaptive reuse as creative office and retail space, the property offers unparalleled flexibility.​ This prime location, coupled with San Diego’s growing tourism sector, makes the property an exceptional investment in one of the city’s most dynamic neighborhoods.​ With the Gaslamp Quarter seeing increasing foot traffic, strong occupancy rates, and high demand for boutique hotels, this is a rare chance to capitalize on the city’s thriving hospitality market.​ Offered at $9,000,000 with significant upside potential, the Louis Bank of Commerce is a landmark opportunity for investors or developers looking to make their mark in downtown San Diego.​

details.marketingDescription:
Investment Property AND Successful Business Opportunity! Located at the merging of Commonwealth Avenue and Sycamore Street in downtown Bristol, VA, this 1.09 acre site has a unique mix of 2-story building, 4-story building and large warehouse for a total of 44,921 Sq Ft.​  Brick buildings have been well maintained, nicely preserving the original historic brick and wood interiors.​  The Door Store currently occupies with ground level with an additional 13,300 Sq Ft of leasable space with private access on upper floors allowing for additional income generating opportunity.​  Warehouse has loading docks and overhead doors surrounding building with paved parking lots on both ends of property with the addition of multiple street front spaces.​  Uniquely located in bustling area, close to historic downtown Bristol and within one mile of the new Hard Rock Hotel and Casino development.​ With the endless opportunities this property has to offer, it's ready to become the cornerstone of your Entrepreneurial dreams!

Included in the sale is The Door Store, Windows and More business, a custom and standard door and window, garage door, mobile home supply and decking company.​ Since 2008 The Door Store has been providing high-value, made-to-order products plus installation service.​ The business is known for unparalleled craftsmanship and customer satisfaction, this is a unique chance to acquire a stable and profitable business.​  The prospective new owner will have immediate access to well-established brands, marketing materials, and a professional website that generates leads.​ Our extensive network of suppliers and industry connections will save you precious time and effort when sourcing materials and building relationships with clients.​  See the business website at: https://www.​thedoorstorewindowsandmore.​com

Tenant – Southern Refrigeration Corporation currently occupies 15,000 sq ft of primarily warehouse space generating $5,000/mo.​ gross income with tenant paying utilities and maintenance.​  Southern Refrigeration Corporation was established in January of 1947 in Roanoke, Virginia and has evolved into eleven branches located throughout the Commonwealth.​  It is a full line/full service Heating, Air Conditioning and Refrigeration Wholesale Distributor currently serving customers in the Mid-Atlantic region and beyond.​ See the business website at: https://srcusa.​com/

Vacant Area - this is the entire upper floors of the building with perhaps the most potential! The attractive wood beams, supports and exposed brick maintain the original building’s design.​ The wood floors plus a mix of carpet and flooring continue throughout.​ One distinctive detail is the open spacious ramp between floors as opposed to enclosed stairs.​ Imagine the uses for this place – brewery, distillery, event center, restaurant, music hall, specialty shops, vintage décor store, open concept office space, residential lofts and so many more.​

This is the perfect opportunity for a quality-focused buyer or entrepreneur seeking a niche market with great potential in one of the leading areas of growth in the nation.​ Bristol is an ideal location to do business due to its strategic location in the Tri-Cities area, a supportive business environment, a vibrant lifestyle and cultural attractions like the Birthplace of Country Music Museum and Bristol Rhythm and Roots Reunion, and a thriving downtown with pedestrian-friendly streets.​ The area also benefits from a skilled workforce, access to educational institutions, and a rich cultural heritage.​ We're in what the Wall Street Journal calls an emerging market, where housing is still a good investment and it’s a great place to live.​

details.investmentHighlights:
RECENTLY COMPLETED HIGH END RENOVATIONS – Since 2020, current ownership has infused $3m in CapEx projects into the property.  Renovations include granite counters, stainless appliances, vinyl plank flooring, tile showers, and washer / dryer connections added to Sprowl units.  A brand-new leasing office and fitness center was built into an existing space at the Sprowl location.  Finally, a swimming pool was added to the Grand Avenue location.  

UNCAPTURED REVENUE ENHANCEMENT OPPORTUNITIES - Union at JTown is a strong candidate for the implementation of a bulk internet and/or a valet waste program.  With continued growth in work-from-home employment, reliable internet access remains one of the highest requested apartment feature by renter's today.  The implementation of a bulk internet feature will not only make the asset more attractive for renter's, but will also add an additional revenue stream for the property.
details.marketingDescription:
Union at JTown: A Prime Multifamily Investment in Louisville’s Top Submarket

Silvestri Real Estate presents the exclusive listing for Union at JTown Apartments, a 131-unit multifamily complex strategically located in Louisville’s desirable Jeffersontown submarket.​ This property offers a compelling opportunity for investors seeking strong, immediate returns and future growth.​

INVESTMENT HIGHLIGHTS

The current ownership has invested over $3 million in capital expenditures since 2020, transforming the property and eliminating deferred maintenance.​ Renovations include premium finishes like stone countertops, stainless steel appliances, modern cabinetry, and washer/dryer connections.​ This extensive upgrade allows a new owner to immediately benefit from a well-maintained, stabilized asset and focus on efficient operations.​

The property is currently under-rented, with in-place effective rents $55 below market rate.​ A new owner can organically bridge this gap, capturing significant upside and increasing the property’s cash flow without additional capital improvements.​

Union at JTown consists of two parcels: 77 units on Sprowl Road and 54 units on Grand Avenue, located less than a half-mile apart.​ This dual-parcel structure offers operational flexibility while capturing a significant presence in the Jeffersontown market.​

ATTRACTIVE ASSUMABLE DEBT

A key advantage of this acquisition is the attractive assumable loan, offering a competitive interest rate and favorable terms.​ This provides a clear path to a streamlined closing and substantial interest savings.​

Loan Balance: $7,597,000

Lender: Fannie Mae (CBRE Capital Markets)

Interest Rate: 3.11%

Loan Term: 12 years (originated April 2020)

Maturity Date: May 1, 2032

Interest-Only Period: 7 years (completed)

Yield Maintenance Period: Ends October 31, 2031

details.marketingDescription:
Kidder Mathews and Bang Realty is pleased to present the opportunity to acquire a freestanding Texas Health Resources medical clinic located at 4635 Frankford Road in Dallas, Texas.​ This ±3,002 SF facility sits on ±0.57 acres and is 100% leased to Texas Health Resources under an absolute NNN lease with no landlord responsibilities.​ The lease commenced in December 2020 and extends through November 2030, featuring 2.5% fixed annual rent increases—a rare feature in single tenant NNN leases and two (2) five year renewal options.​

The subject property is an outparcel to a newly remodeled Tom Thumb grocery store, benefiting from excellent visibility, strong daily traffic, and retail synergy.​ It is located in an affluent, densely populated area of North Dallas, surrounded by established residential neighborhoods, top-rated schools, and high household incomes, further supporting long-term tenant performance and demand for medical services.​

Offered at $2,941,278 the property provides a cap rate of 4.85%.​ Backed by a corporate guaranty from Texas Health Resources, one of the largest nonprofit health systems in the U.​S.​ with investment-grade credit, this offering delivers a stable, management-free investment in one of Dallas’ most desirable healthcare corridors.​ An ideal opportunity for 1031 exchange buyers or investors seeking secure, inflation-hedged cash flow.​

SRS National Net Lease is pleased to offer the opportunity to acquire the fee simple interest (land & building ownership) in an absolute NNN leased, Popeyes investment property located in Harpersville, Alabama.​ The tenant, AIM QSR, LLC, has 17.5+ years remaining with 4 (5-year) options to extend, demonstrating their commitment to the site.​ The lease features 10% rental increases every 5 years throughout the initial term and options, steadily growing NOI and hedging against inflation.​ The lease is absolute NNN with zero landlord responsibilities making it an ideal, management free investment opportunity for a passive investor.​ Popeyes is a subsidiary of Restaurant Brands International Inc.​ is one of the world’s largest quick service restaurant companies with more than $40 billion in annual system-wide sales and over 30,000 restaurants in more than 100 countries.​

The Popeyes is located near the signalized, hard corner intersection of State Hwy 53 and U.​S.​ Hwy 231 with a combined 24,700 VPD.​ The site is in close proximity to multiple national/credit tenants including Marathon, Dollar General, Exxon, Chevron, Jack’s, and many more.​ Strong tenant synergy increases consumer draw to the immediate trade area and promotes crossover store exposure to the site.​ Furthermore, the asset is near Coosa Valley Academy (237 students), further increasing consumer traffic to the immediate trade area.​ The 5-mile trade area is supported by a population of over 4,000 and 1,000 employees.​ Residents within a 1-mile trade radius boast an affluent average household income of $105,707.​
